title: Jamboree
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Owen Brothers Animated Films
brief_description: The story begins with preparations near Melbourne for the Pacific Jamboree, which 10,500 scouts, from Pacific as well as European countries, attended. The film also includes performances of different national dances.
